renewed-contributions.title: The Deathless Miracle
renewed-contributions.note: Title and issue per FictionMags.  CCE does not record a renewal with this story or issue title, but does record a renewal for 'Angel Unawares (Deathless Miracle)' in the March 28 issue. We have not examined the issues in quesstion.

renewed-contributions.title: Angel Unawares (Deathless Miracle)
renewed-contributions.note: Title and issue per CCE renewal record.  FictionMags does not record a story with this title or author in this issue, but does mention a story 'Deathless Miracle' by Farnol in the March 21 issue. We have not examined the issues in quesstion.

renewed-contributions.title: Spring in the Heart
renewed-contributions.note: Issue date as given on cover.  CCE renewal record gives issue date as April 14; that appears to be an error.

renewed-contributions.title: The Backslider
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record spells author first name 'Lucien'.

renewed-contributions.title: T'Want Do No Harm
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record spells author first name 'Lucien'.

renewed-contributions.title: Little Queen of Pearls
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Queen of Pearls'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: The Practically Perfect Young Man
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record spells author first name 'Lucien'. Title as given in CCE renewal record; FictionMags gives title simply as 'Practically Perfect'.

renewed-contributions.title: One to the Button
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record spells author first name 'Lucien'.

renewed-contributions.title: The Hideaway
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record spells author first name 'Lucien'.

renewed-contributions.title: The Mare Queerless
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Little Queerless'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: Poor Little Man
renewed-contributions.note: This contribution was renewed under this title, and again under the title 'Hold-Up', which apparently was an alternate title for the same story.  We are not sure which title was used in this issue. FictionMags gives the title 'Poor Little Man' in its table of contents for this issue.

renewed-contributions.title: Annett's Love Story
renewed-contributions.note: Title as spelled in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags spells title as 'Annette's Love Story'. We have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: Girl and the Quarterback
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'My Quarterback'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: The Strange Fate of Johann Bartok
Sure to Love
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Sure to Lose'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: Brandon's Folly
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Brandow's Folly'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: The Strange Attacks on Mr. Hoover
A Dog's Chance
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives the title of a Farnol story in this issue as 'Not Much to Look At'. A story with the title 'A Dog's Chance' does appear in a later book of short stories by Farnol; we have not checked to see if it is the same story under a different title.

renewed-contributions.title: The Spirit of the Black Hawk
What Happened to Philip Hope
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'What Happened to Philip Home'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: One of These Days
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'One of Those Days'. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: Cloud's on the Circle-P
renewed-contributions.note: Title as punctuated in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'Clouds on the Circle-P'. We have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: No Way to Win a Girl
The Way of Unrighteousness
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'The Way of the Unrighteous'. We have not examined the issue in question.

comment: Pick up with 1960 Jan-Jun contribution renewals.
